ai-ud6.3:1.2_0: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.
ai-ud6.3:1.3_0: Now at that time the Buddha was sitting reviewing his own giving up of many bad, unskillful qualities, and the many skillful qualities he had fully developed.
ai-ud6.3:2.1_0: Then, knowing the many bad, unskillful qualities that he had given up and the many skillful qualities he had fully developed, on that occasion the Buddha expressed this heartfelt sentiment:
ai-ud6.3:3.2_0: what before was not then was.
ai-ud6.3:3.3_0: It never was, nor will it be,
